title: Ring Around the Rosie
short_plot_summary: Children sing and dance in a circle while holding hands and performing actions related to the lyrics about flowers and falling down.
explanation: A girl, symbolizing children who participate in the game
A boy, representing the other children who join in the song and dance
A bouquet of flowers, referencing the 'rosie' in the title
A flower, symbolizing the 'posie' mentioned in the lyrics
A face with a mask, denoting the historical association of the rhyme with the plague, though this connection is debated
